summary: Have you wanted to Pillage as the beasts that walk the planes of Oblivion? Now You Can!
descriptionHtml:
Just your old fashioned Race mod. Now you can Play as the Mighty Dremora from the planes of Oblivion! I'm working toward adding upgraded Dremora Armor to fit the Epicness of your new Player. Let me know if you run into any problems :)
----------------------------------------------------
FEMALES SUPPORTED
----------------------------------------------------
Bonus Attributes:

+15 Conjuration
+10 Two Handed
+10 Alteration

The Magic of Oblivion significantly increases Magicka by 150%

Demonic Skin helps absorb damage (HP +50)

Restless Sins (SP +50)
-------------------------------------------------------
author: PlatenJack
